languages.text: "Чужая палуба под сапогами, свет аварийных ламп — давненько я не принимал участия в абордаже. Будто стал моложе на десяток лет!"
languages.translation_comment: At the start of the boarding mission.

traits.locale_text: "Чужая палуба под сапогами, свет аварийных ламп — давненько я не принимал участия в абордаже. Будто стал моложе на десяток лет!"

languages.text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
languages.translation_comment: At the start of the boarding mission.
languages.original_text: "Чужая палуба под сапогами, свет аварийных ламп — давненько я не принимал участия в абордаже. Будто стал моложе на десяток лет!"

traits.locale_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
"Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
"Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
"Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
"Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
"Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

languages.text: 「別の乗組員のデッキをブーツで踏みしめ、非常灯がきらめく…乗船作戦に参加するのは久しぶりです。ああ、まるで10歳は若返った気分ですよ！」
languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

traits.locale_text: 「別の乗組員のデッキをブーツで踏みしめ、非常灯がきらめく…乗船作戦に参加するのは久しぶりです。ああ、まるで10歳は若返った気分ですよ！」

languages.text: "Das Deck einer anderen Crew unter meinen Füßen, das Flackern der Notbeleuchtung ... ich war schon lange nicht auf einer Entermission. Da fühle ich mich gleich zehn Jahre jünger!"
languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Deck einer anderen Crew unter meinen Füßen, das Flackern der Notbeleuchtung ... ich war schon lange nicht auf einer Entermission. Da fühle ich mich gleich zehn Jahre jünger!"

languages.text: « Le pont d'un autre équipage sous mes pieds, la lueur des éclairages de secours... Cela faisait bien longtemps que je n'avais pas pris part à une mission d'abordage. J'ai l'impression d'avoir rajeuni de dix ans ! »
languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

traits.locale_text: « Le pont d'un autre équipage sous mes pieds, la lueur des éclairages de secours... Cela faisait bien longtemps que je n'avais pas pris part à une mission d'abordage. J'ai l'impression d'avoir rajeuni de dix ans ! »

languages.text: «La cubierta de una tripulación ajena bajo mis botas, el brillo de las luces de emergencia; hacía tiempo que no participaba en una misión de abordaje. ¡Me siento diez años más joven!».
languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

traits.locale_text: «La cubierta de una tripulación ajena bajo mis botas, el brillo de las luces de emergencia; hacía tiempo que no participaba en una misión de abordaje. ¡Me siento diez años más joven!».

languages.text: “我的脚下踩着另一艘船的甲板，眼前是应急灯的闪光——自从我上次执行登舰作战以来，已经不知道过了多久了。啊，我感觉自己仿佛年轻了十岁！”
languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

traits.locale_text: “我的脚下踩着另一艘船的甲板，眼前是应急灯的闪光——自从我上次执行登舰作战以来，已经不知道过了多久了。啊，我感觉自己仿佛年轻了十岁！”

languages.text: "Yepyeni bir güverteye ayak basmak, acil durum ışıkları... En son ne zaman bordalama görevine çıktığımı hatırlamıyorum. On yaş gençleştim resmen!"
languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"

traits.locale_text: "Yepyeni bir güverteye ayak basmak, acil durum ışıkları... En son ne zaman bordalama görevine çıktım, hatırlamıyorum. On yaş gençleştim resmen!"

languages.original_text: "Another crew's deck under my boots, the flare of emergency lights — it has been a spell since I last went on a boarding mission. Why, I feel a decade younger!"
